comment:
* Contains methods for accessing and monitoring preferred video captioning state and visual
 * properties.

variables.name: DEFAULT_PRESET
variables.comment: Default style preset as an index into {@link CaptionStyle#PRESETS}.

variables.name: DEFAULT_FONT_SCALE
variables.comment: Default scaling value for caption fonts.

variables.name: mStyleChangedRunnable
variables.comment:
* Runnable posted when user style properties change. This is used to
     * prevent unnecessary change notifications when multiple properties change
     * in rapid succession.

methods.name: public final boolean isEnabled()
methods.comment: * @return the user's preferred captioning enabled state

methods.name: public final String getRawLocale()
methods.comment:
* @return the raw locale string for the user's preferred captioning
     *         language
     * @hide

methods.name: public final Locale getLocale()
methods.comment:
* @return the locale for the user's preferred captioning language, or null
     *         if not specified

methods.name: public final float getFontScale()
methods.comment:
* @return the user's preferred font scaling factor for video captions, or 1 if not
     *         specified

methods.name: public int getRawUserStyle()
methods.comment:
* @return the raw preset number, or the first preset if not specified
     * @hide

methods.name: public CaptionStyle getUserStyle()
methods.comment:
* @return the user's preferred visual properties for captions as a
     *         {@link CaptionStyle}, or the default style if not specified

methods.name: public void addCaptioningChangeListener(@NonNull CaptioningChangeListener listener)
methods.comment:
* Adds a listener for changes in the user's preferred captioning enabled
     * state and visual properties.
     *
     * @param listener the listener to add

methods.name: public void removeCaptioningChangeListener(@NonNull CaptioningChangeListener listener)
methods.comment:
* Removes a listener previously added using
     * {@link #addCaptioningChangeListener}.
     *
     * @param listener the listener to remove
